name: Merrell Moab FST Mid A/C Waterproof Boots - Children to Youths
categories: Moab FST Mid A/C Waterproof Boots
description: A waterproof trail shoe with a sticky and durable sole. Designed for kids who like to travel fast through all kinds of wet, muddy terrain. Compression-moulded foam cushions and supports as they boot down the trail.Lightweight synthetic and mesh upper for long-lasting durability.M-Select dry waterproof-breathable booty construction keeps water out.Lace-up with hook-and-loop strap for easy on and off.Air cushioned heel absorbs shocks and a moulded nylon shank adds support.Non-marking M-Select Grip rubber outsole for traction on wet and dry surfaces.
